title: Can't disable rendering for headless unit test

content.raw:
I am using the `ServerFixture` class provided and am extending it to do my own gazebo integrated unit testing, but when I run them in a docker I get the following error,
```
[Err] [RenderEngine.cc:734] Can't open display: 
[Wrn] [RenderEngine.cc:97] Unable to create X window. Rendering will be disabled
[Wrn] [RenderEngine.cc:301] Cannot initialize render engine since render path type is NONE. Ignore this warning ifrendering has been turned off on purpose.
```
It doesn't cause any problems, as I expect it to not render anything since it's running on a CI server in a headless environment. But would be nice if I could tell it to not even attempt rendering.
